inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, feedUrl is required. All other inputs are ignored.

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: Azure Artifacts Feed url.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, workloadIdentityServiceConnection is required. All other inputs are ignored. Not compatible with cargoServiceConnections. Feed Url should be in the cargo registry format, e.g. https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/{ORG_NAME}/{PROJECT}/_packaging/{FEED_NAME}/Cargo/index/

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: config.toml file to authenticate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the config.toml file that specifies the registries you want to work with. Select the file, not the folder e.g. "/.cargo/config.toml".

inputs.name: cargoServiceConnections
inputs.label: Credentials for registries outside this organization/collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Credentials to use for external registries located in the project's config.toml. For registries in this organization/collection, leave this blank; the buildâ€™s credentials are used automatically.
